### WeChat does not provide RSS service officially

### The WeChat public account RSS service in this app is provided by Wechat2RSS, currently free (thanks üôè)

### Users can visit the <mark>[Wechat2RSS official website](https://wechat2rss.xlab.app/)</mark> to view the complete list of public accounts

### Find the public account you want to subscribe to and copy its RSS link
![](images/more_wechat1.png)

### Paste the link into the RSS URL input box at the top of the page, click the Add button to subscribe
![](images/RSS_URL.png)
